import React from 'react'; import './Play.css'; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const Play = () => { const [currentUrl, setCurrentUrl] = useState(''); const [showRules, setShowRules] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Update the currentUrl state with the current window URL setCurrentUrl(window.location.href); }, []); const handleCopy = () => { navigator.clipboard.writeText(currentUrl); }; const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleStartGame = () => { setShowRules(true); }; return (
{showRules ? (

)}
); } export default Play;
